name: About To Live
description:
Did you know? According to old legends, the realm of death is populated with butterflies symbolizing hope for a new life...

In About To Live, you'll play as a soul that took a hell butterfly's shape. With this power, you'll may be able to reborn as a human beeing... Maybe.

Collect cards and trade them to build your best deck and face the various enemies in the world of About To Live.
